title: Michael Laudrup
summary: Michael Laudrup (Danish pronunciation: [ˈmiˌkʰɛˀl ˈlɑwˀtʁɔp], born 15 June 1964) is a Danish professional football coach and former player. He is the older brother of fellow retired footballer Brian Laudrup. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time.[3][4][5][6]
